transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ji, uh, Sachin ji baat kar rahe hain, Rudraksh?
Customer: Haan ji, Sachin ji baat kar rahe hain. Kya Rudraksh ka print se?
Executive: Haan ji sir, main Sunny Prakash baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Sir aapne apne account, sir maine jo call kiya tha, right sir?
Customer: Right, right.
Executive: Bas wo actually due to health issue.
Customer: Haan, sir wo due to health issue na available nahi hai office mein. To abhi maine dekha to just maine aapko call kiya. Bataiye sir.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Haan, maine isliye call kiya tha actually kya hai main ye jaanna chah raha tha. Ab main bhi abhi system pe nahi hun lekin ye hai ki jaise kya hota hai ki jaise hum koi tender usme se wo kar rahe hain, dekh rahe hain.
Hmm hmm hmm. 
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: Ab wo tender ki mere paas na uska number hai, see number jo hai wo number mere ko mere paas hai. Ab wo miss ho gaya mujhse. To main usko fir se read karna chah raha hun. To wo apan kahan uski detail dekh payenge?
Executive: Bilkul ho jayega sir. Dekhiye IndiaMART aap search kariega jaise inbox mein search karne ke liye hota hai na.
Customer: Aapko yaad hai ki kis date ko aapne tender liya uthaya tha sir aise?
Customer: Haan, mujhe wo wo yaad hai uska number bhi dikh raha hai wo jo apne ko usme jo detail mein dikhta hai na.
Customer: Wahan par wo detail mein hai.
Customer: Lekin uski detail main nahi dekh pa raha hun.
Executive: Main batata hun kaise sir. Wo aap apna email open kariye.
Customer: Kya email?
Executive: Haan. Hello?
Customer: Email pe se to sab delete ho gaya wo sara.
Executive: Sir jo registered email ID hai na aapki IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Usko open kariye sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Usko open. Open kar diya sir?
Customer: Hmm. Haan.
Executive: Uspe likhiye sir IndiaMART tender.
Executive: Search kiya sir aapne IndiaMART tender karke?
Executive: Jo first option rehta hai.
Customer: IndiaMART tender. Haan, search kar liya.
Executive: Kya aaya sir aap search karke dekhiye aapko multiple emails aa rahe hain. Bahut sare mail dikh rahe hain.
Executive: Ji sir, ab jo sir date wala aapka tha jis din aapne wo tender kiya tha us din ka wo email open kariye. Usme aapko detail rahega aur link bhi rahega. Email pe aa jata hai wo detail aisa bol rahe hain aap?
Executive: Ji sir, aap jab purchase karte hain na uska sara detail email pe aa jata hai. Ji.
Customer: Achcha jo purchase karte hain uska sara detail. Haan jaise validity aapko validity ka detail aapko IndiaMART pe dikhta hai lead manager pe. Kyunki sir wo IndiaMART ka khud ka hota hai na generate kiya hua. Tender kya hota hai ki third party ka rehta hai matlab ki koi government tender rehta hai ya koi private tender rehta hai. Wo IndiaMART ka direct tender nahi hai.
Customer: Haan mujhe pata hai wo jam ke jam ke wo wo tender jam ke rehte hain adhikansh taur par.
Executive: Ji ji. To isliye hum tender ka detail na aapke email pe bhejte hain taki aap email se sara access kar paye unke portal pe ja kar ke.
Customer: Theek hai, main dekh leta hun ek bar. Main system pe baith ke dekh leta hun ek bar. Kuch confusing aayega to fir aapko call bhi karunga.
Executive: Done sir. Haan isi number pe aap call back kar lijiyega main available rahunga. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to retrieve tender details.

Resolution:

- Executive advised checking registered email ID.

- Executive explained tender details are sent via email.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and call back if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, email, detail, indiamart
